    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Tejidos musculares</string>
            <string language="en">Muscle tissue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Muskelgewebe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tissu de muscle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tecido do músculo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tessuto del muscolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστός μυών</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno debe buscar datos sobre los distintos tipos de tejidos musculares para crear una tabla comparativa con la información recogida.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student must look for data on the different types of muscle tissue to create a comparative table with the information collected.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Tejidos musculares</string>
            <string language="en">Muscle tissues</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer nach Daten 
bezüglich der unterschiedlichen Typen des Muskelgewebes suchen muß, 
um eine vergleichbare Tabelle mit den Informationen herzustellen, 
sammelte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
rechercher des données sur les différents types de tissu de muscle 
pour créer une table comparative avec l'information s'est 
rassemblée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A pesquisa em que o estudante deve procurar dados
nos tipos diferentes de tecido do músculo para criar uma tabela 
comparativa com a informação coletou.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La ricerca in cui l'allievo deve cercare i dati 
sui tipi differenti di tessuti del muscolo per creare una tabella 
comparativa con le informazioni ha raccolto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να ψάξει τα 
στοιχεία όσον αφορά τους διαφορετικούς τύπους ιστών μυών για να
δημιουργήσει έναν συγκριτικό πίνακα με τις πληροφορίες 
συλλεχθείσες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
